articles.content: The Muppets are one of those tricksy chunks of IP that fans almost categorically love the more the creations skew towards the original series comedic stylings and sensibilities. After a pair of so-so… [+1561 chars]

articles.title: Michelin bestows 2021 restaurant stars despite Covid-19 closures - FRANCE 24 English
articles.description: The Michelin Guide consecrated France's 30th three-star restaurant on Monday as it presented its awards for 2021 against the backdrop of the Covid-19 crisis, which has seen chefs forced to close their doors.
